summary: Rebecca Knowles et al. collate data from 20 low- and middle-income countries. andres I Vecino-Ortiz & Deivis N Guzman-Tordecilla (169–175) study gun-carrying restrictions and gun-related mortality. india Medical devices and adverse events Shatrunajay Shukla et al. (207–212) describe the expansion of regulatory scope to medical devices. global treating hepatitis C Hugo Perazzo et al. (189–198) review the evidence of effectiveness for generic direct-acting agents. Hidden determinants of early childhood outcomes Gautam Bhan (220–222) examine the links between informal work and maternal and child health.
